mapper.sql: id, user_id, movie_id, user_score, content, comment_date, support_num, is_pass, parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM pddou_comment c JOIN pddou_user u ON c.user_id=u.id JOIN pddou_movie m ON c.movie_id=m.id
u.username LIKE concat('%',#{username},'%')
AND m.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{movieName},'%')
AND c.is_pass=#{isPass}

SELECT m.id, m.poster, m.`name`, cast(c.user_score/2 as decimal(3,1)) AS user_score, c.content FROM (SELECT movie_id, user_score, content, comment_date FROM pddou_comment WHERE user_id=#{userId}) c JOIN pddou_movie m ON c.movie_id=m.id ORDER BY c.comment_date DESC

SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.movie_id, u.avatar, u.username, c.user_score, c.content, c.comment_date, c.support_user FROM (SELECT id, user_id, movie_id, user_score, content, comment_date, support_num, support_user FROM pddou_comment WHERE is_pass=1 AND movie_id=#{movieId}) c JOIN pddou_user u ON c.user_id=u.id ORDER BY c.support_num DESC
